jfxtras.labs.animation.canned

Class FadeOutLeftTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.animation.Animation
      • javafx.animation.Transition
        • jfxtras.labs.animation.canned.CachedTimelineTransition
          • jfxtras.labs.animation.canned.FadeOutLeftTransition

  • public class FadeOutLeftTransition
extends CachedTimelineTransition
    Animate a fade out left effect on a node Port of FadeOutLeft from Animate.css http://daneden.me/animate by Dan Eden @keyframes fadeOutLeft { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(0); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(-20px); } }
